Every Tool You Need

Complete Solana wallet toolkit running entirely in your browser. No servers. No tracking. No compromise.

üîë

Vanity Address Generation

Generate Solana addresses with custom prefixes and suffixes. Your OG name on the blockchain.

‚ö°

Instant Wallet Creation

Generate secure Ed25519 keypairs instantly using official @solana/web3.js.

‚úçÔ∏è

Message Signing

Sign and verify messages with Ed25519 signatures. Prove ownership of any address.

üîç

Address Validation

Validate any Solana address format. Check Base58 encoding and key structure.

üîê

Keypair Verification

Full 7-point keypair validation. Verify key-address pairs match correctly.

üìä

Difficulty Estimation

Benchmark your device and estimate vanity address mining time before you start.

üîÑ

Wallet Restore

Restore wallets from JSON arrays or Base58 secret keys. Solana CLI compatible.

üõ°Ô∏è

100% Client-Side

All cryptography runs in your browser. No server calls. Fully air-gappable.

Security First

Only official Solana Labs libraries touch your keys. The code is auditable, open-source, and designed for air-gapped use.

Vanity Address Difficulty

Solana addresses use Base58 encoding (58 characters per position). Longer patterns take exponentially more time.

CharactersDifficultyEst. Time (8 cores)
11 in 58Instant
21 in 3,364< 1 second
31 in 195,112~2 seconds
41 in 11,316,496~2 minutes
51 in 656,356,768~2 hours
61 in 38+ billion~4 days
7+1 in 2+ trillionWeeks+

Ready to Generate?

All tools run entirely in your browser. No sign-up, no tracking, no server-side processing.
